paramInformation.label: Threshold of current for Load Caution
Threshold of KWh for Load Caution

options.label: SWITCH OFF commands received are ignored.
SWITCH OFF commands received are honored.
The LED follows the state of the switch.

paramInformation.label: Auto off timer
paramInformation.description: Auto off timer. 0 will disable the auto off function.

options.label: SWITCH ALL OFF turns Switch OFF
If ALL OFF is received, turn ON if it is OFF
SWITCH ALL OFF turns Switch ON

metadata.inclusion:
1. Put your Z-Wave controller into inclusion mode by following the instructions provided by the controller manufacturer. 
2. Pressing On/Off button three times within 2 seconds will enter inclusion 
 mode on the switch.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Put your Z-Wave controller into exclusion mode by following the instructions provided by the controller manufacturer. 
2. Pressing On/Off button three times within 2 seconds will enter exclusion 
 mode on the switch.
metadata.reset:
(Use this procedure only in the event that the primary controller is lost or otherwise inoperable.)

1. Pressing On/Off button three times within 2 seconds will enter inclusion mode on the switch.
2. Within 1 second, press On/Off button again for 5 seconds.
